user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mr. Harrison Blackwood (hblackwood@investor.com) detailing our collaboration potential. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Details Needed for Drafting Email to Mr. Harrison Blackwood

Hi Jane,

I’m about to draft the collaboration-overview email you’d like to send to Mr. Harrison Blackwood (hblackwood@investor.com). Could you please point me to, or grant me access to, the relevant Notion pages that cover:

• Sterling & Locke’s current investment focus and performance highlights  
• Specific partnership structures or co-investment models we wish to propose  
• Recent success stories or case studies that reinforce our value proposition  
• Any preferred talking points, KPIs, or calls-to-action you’d like included  
• Target timeline or next steps we want to suggest

If there’s anything else you’d like emphasized, just let me know. Once I have this information, I can draft the email for your review and sign-off.

Thanks in advance!

Best,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
